sms_senders_add_sender_choice_domain: Add senders from your OVHcloud domain names
sms_senders_add_sender_info_timetable_va: Name (manual validation within one to two working days): From Monday to Friday, 08:00 - 20:00.
sms_senders_add_sender_warning_text:
Mobile phone operators do not allow SMS sending with phone numbers listed as a sender.
You can use a custom alphabetical sender name, or a short number that allows for a reply.
sms_senders_add_sender_warning_text_doma: Only domains with 11 characters or less are compatible.
sms_senders_add_sender_warning_text_nich: Some phones will not display punctuation characters for senders.
sms_senders_add_sender_error_pattern: The “sender” field must only contain alphabetical characters.
sms_senders_add_sender_error_maxlength: The “sender” field must not exceed 11 characters.
sms_senders_add_sender_description_error: The “description” field must not exceed 40 characters.
sms_senders_add_sender_reason_error_maxl: The “short justification” field must not exceed 250 characters.
sms_senders_add_sender_supporting_docume: As part of our security policy, we ask for a supporting document. By default, this is a company or trademark letterhead, including the authorisation of an official with signature and stamp of the same company, an identity paper, or a Kbis extract if it is not a trademark.
